name: Distant Frontier
description:
Hi, my name is Zentaya (Zen for short) and I am a newbie game developer.

Distant Frontier is a top-down wave survival shooter. Fend off against increasing hordes of aliens and survive for as long as possible. After each wave, buy new equipment and ammunition to maximize your survival chances. How long will you last?

DISCLAIMER: This is a work in progress as well as the first project that I decided to release. Any feedback is helpful and I hope you will enjoy the game.

To do:

- Boss Fight

- Game Over Screen

- Bug fixes
